name: Magic UI
description: Beautiful and free UI components to build stunning landing pages.
introduction:
## Tool Introduction
Magic UI is an open-source UI library packed with over 50 animated and visually appealing components built using React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. It serves as the perfect companion for shadcn/ui, allowing developers to effortlessly create captivating landing pages with minimal effort.

## Key Features
- 50+ free and open-source animated UI components
- Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion
- Designed to complement shadcn/ui for building landing pages
- Regularly updated with new components and features

## Use Cases
- Building visually stunning and engaging landing pages
- Enhancing the user experience of web applications
- Rapid prototyping and development of React-based projects

## Usage Tips
- Utilize the provided component demos and documentation
- Leverage Tailwind CSS utilities for custom styling
- Explore the community showcases for inspiration
